mapper.select: /* accountPortal.selectPortalCorpCardList 포탈 법인카드 사용내역 */ SELECT ACR.ReceiptID , ACR.CardNo , ACR.ItemNo , ACR.ApproveNo , ACR.StoreRegNo , ACR.StoreName , ACR.StoreNo , ACR.UseDate , DATE_FORMAT( ACR.UseDate, '%Y.%m.%d') UseDateStr FROM covi_account4j_si.act_card_receipt ACR INNER JOIN covi_account4j_si.act_corp_card ACC ON ACR.CardNo = ACC.CardNo WHERE 1=1 AND ( (IFNULL(NULLIF(ACR.TossUserCode,''),'NODATA') = 'NODATA' AND ACC.OwnerUserCode = #{UR_Code}) OR (ACR.TossUserCode = #{UR_Code}) OR (ACC.CorpCardID IN (SELECT ACCSU.CorpCardID FROM covi_account4j_si.act_corp_card_search_user ACCSU WHERE ACCSU.OwnerUserCode = #{UR_Code}) ) ) AND IFNULL(NULLIF(ACR.IsPersonalUse,''),'N') = 'N' ORDER BY ACR.UseDate DESC LIMIT 5

/* accountPortal.selectPortalCorpCardListCnt 포탈 법인카드 사용내역 */ SELECT Count(*) FROM covi_account4j_si.act_card_receipt ACR INNER JOIN covi_account4j_si.act_corp_card ACC ON ACR.CardNo = ACC.CardNo WHERE 1=1 AND ( (IFNULL(NULLIF(ACR.TossUserCode,''),'NODATA') = 'NODATA' AND ACC.OwnerUserCode = #{UR_Code}) OR (ACR.TossUserCode = #{UR_Code}) OR (ACC.CorpCardID IN (SELECT ACCSU.CorpCardID FROM covi_account4j_si.act_corp_card_search_user ACCSU WHERE ACCSU.OwnerUserCode = #{UR_Code}) ) ) AND IFNULL(NULLIF(ACR.IsPersonalUse,''),'N') = 'N'

/* accountPortal.selectExpAppAprvList 포탈 승인신청내역 */ SELECT EA.ExpenceApplicationID , EA.ApplicationTitle , EA.CompanyCode , EA.ApplicationType , EA.ApplicationDate , EA.UR_Code , DATE_FORMAT( EA.ApplicationDate, '%Y.%m.%d') ApplicationDateStr , EA.ProcessID FROM covi_account4j_si.act_expence_application EA WHERE 1=1 AND EA.UR_Code = #{UR_Code} ORDER BY EA.ApplicationDate DESC LIMIT 5
/* accountPortal.selectExpAppAprvListCnt 포탈 승인신청내역 */ SELECT Count(*) FROM covi_account4j_si.act_expence_application EA WHERE 1=1 AND EA.UR_Code = #{UR_Code}

/* accountPortal.selectDeadlineInfo 마감일자 조회 */ SELECT DL.DeadlineID, DATE_FORMAT(DL.DeadlineStartDate,'%Y.%m.%d') AS DeadlineStartDate, DATE_FORMAT(DL.DeadlineStartDate,'%c') AS DeadlineStartMon, DATE_FORMAT(DL.DeadlineFinishDate,'%Y.%m.%d') AS DeadlineFinishDate, DATE_FORMAT(DL.DeadlineFinishDate,'%c') AS DeadlineFinishDateMon, DATE_FORMAT(DL.DeadlineFinishDate,'%d') AS DeadlineFinishDateDay FROM covi_account4j_si.act_deadline DL WHERE DL.CompanyCode = #{companyCode} ORDER BY DL.DeadlineID DESC LIMIT 1

/* accountPortal.selectCorpCardUseInfoList 포탈 카드정보 목록 */ SELECT A.CardNo , CONCAT('****-****-**', SUBSTRING(A.CardNo,11,2), '-', SUBSTRING(A.CardNo,13) ) AS CardNoView , A.CardCompany , A.CardCompanyName , A.OwnerUserCode , A.OwnerUser , A.LimitAmount , A.UseAmt , (A.UseAmt/A.LimitAmount)*100 AS UsePer , (A.LimitAmount - A.UseAmt) AS RemainAmt , 100-((A.UseAmt/A.LimitAmount)*100) AS RemainPer FROM (
SELECT CC.CardNo , CC.CardCompany , covi_account4j_si.Fn_GetBaseCodeName('CardCompany', CC.CardCompany, 'ALL') CardCompanyName , CC.OwnerUserCode , USR.DisplayName OwnerUser , CC.LimitAmount , IFNULL(SUM(CR.AmountWon), 0) UseAmt FROM covi_account4j_si.act_corp_card CC LEFT OUTER JOIN covi_account4j_si.act_card_receipt CR ON CC.CardNo = CR.CardNo AND DATE_FORMAT( CR.UseDate, '%Y%m') = DATE_FORMAT( NOW(), '%Y%m') LEFT OUTER JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_object_user USR ON CC.OwnerUserCode = USR.UserCode WHERE 1=1 AND ( (IFNULL(NULLIF(CR.TossUserCode,''),'NODATA') = 'NODATA' AND CC.OwnerUserCode = #{UR_Code}) OR (CR.TossUserCode = #{UR_Code}) OR (CC.CorpCardID IN (SELECT ACCSU.CorpCardID FROM covi_account4j_si.act_corp_card_search_user ACCSU WHERE ACCSU.OwnerUserCode = #{UR_Code}) ) ) AND CC.CardStatus = 'CSTS01' GROUP BY CC.CardNo ) A
